description:
Decision-making is a key skill in the workplace, and is particularly important if you want to be an effective leader or a " real " entrepreneur.

In this course you re not gonna feel that you re sitting in regular lecture but you're gonna fell you're sitting next to me.
You'll learn what is a decision-making model and why you need them as entrepreneur.
Then you'll learn about models that guides you to chose between options and decide whether to go ahead or not.
And of course you'll know so much more about improving your decision-making skill and how to make a group decisions

Don't wait up ... this's your chance to step up into entrepreneurship world.
title: Decision-making models for entrepreneurs
